node.title: Friday Download: Best of Bundle, Feb ’15 Edition

node.excerpt: As a result of Kickstarter fan support, HITS is coming to theaters in 50 cities across the US starting February 12. Your first look is here. Grab the free preview Bundle to unlock unreleased video, interviews, art, and more.
